EMV Layer 4 and Example Terminal Application

Detailed Description

Representation of a PICC for the EMV software stack. The variables uid and uidLength contain valid data after successful anticollision (emvCollisionDetection()). Other data members are only guaranteed to hold valid data after successful activation (emvActivate()).
